description:
Kurihara-san heads to the pool with Momo-kun and his friends, where she`s excited to see Momo-kun in a swimsuit for the first time. On the way home, Momo-kun walks Kurihara-san to her bus stop as usual, but in order to reverse their relationship of her taking the lead all the time, he finally decides to take action! Though he succeeds in stopping Kurihara-san, Momo-kun finds himself unable to lead her properly and is at a loss. Feeling as though Kurihara-san never sees him as a man, without thinking, Momo-kun... Kurihara-san is bewildered when she sees this new side of Momo-kun, and...
Source: crunchyroll
